hymn.title: Lord, You are the living spring
hymn.category: Praise of the Lord—As Our Supply

layout.singingstanza: Lord, You are the liv -- ing spring, The riv -- er of wa -- ter of life; On -- ly You can quench my thirst; On -- ly You sat -- is -- fy. Lord, You are the liv -- ing tree, You are the Tree of Life; On -- ly You can fill my hun -- ger; On -- ly You sat -- is -- fy. Ev -- ery mo -- ment in so man -- y ways He is the sure sup -- ply; Now and for -- ev -- er and al -- ways, On -- ly You sat -- is -- fy.

lyrics.stanza: Every moment in so many ways He is the sure supply; Now and forever and always, Only You satisfy.
